title: LHD Pearl White 1963 11 window panel van Plus Devon Interior

posts.content:
Another year has passed and I've not touched the van and with a new house that I'm refurbishing and being in storage miles from home, its time to let someone else finish it and enjoy.

Californian Import that has had a bare metal restro inside outside and underneath in body colour, Basically is was a Sundial Panel van that had windows cut in so I had genuine window frames welded in properly. Everything is basically new it just needs finishing and in capable hands probably weekends work! a few body work touch ups, MOT and register.

It has all the best bits, disc brakes up front, VW Jim servo, brand new Laurie Pettite 1776cc engine with vintage speed exhaust, New clutch, Suspension, rebuilt spindles, rebuilt steering box, brand new 12V Peter Good Wiring loom, Deluxe interior front seats and door cards, new lights, brand new tyres and wheels (x5), Seat belt fixings Painted inside out. Safari Windows, The only known Genuine Devon LHD 64 interior. Plus much, much more. This Bus will/would have been fantastic! Gutted but If was going to finish it I'd have done it by now.

The restro is here:- http://www.ssvc.org.uk/phpbb/viewtopic.php?f=8&t=77633

Last pic I took (the bug is not for sale!)



ps it was built Dec '63 so '64 spec incase you where wondering.. it comes with a Wolfsburg Cert anyway

SALE ON HOLD

Hi, interested in your van if it's still available? What needs doing to complete and get it on the road? What needs doing to register it?
Regards Ben
bensmith9934s@gmail.com
Give me a tel no so we can speak.
Still available. Will try and get some current pics soon.
Back for sale, losing my storage by the end of the year
